    Class to create dialogs to edit information about the characters.

    • Method Detail

      • showDialog

        public android.app.Dialog showDialog(android.app.Activity activity)
        We instantiate and show a dialog each time the method is called. This contains a normal set of buttons, information like a title, an adapter, the corresponding layout, the showing of the dialog and the return of the same dialog.
        Parameters:
        activity - the final activity in the context that its called.
        Returns:
        a created dialog.

      • getAdapter

        public DialogCharacterEditorAdapter getAdapter()
        We get the adapter corresponding to the activity.
        Returns:
        an adapter.
